## Yoot interface

The public Yoot API: a callable factory for new states, with chainable methods.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface Yoot extends YootFactory, DirectiveMethods, OutputMethods
```

**Extends:** [YootFactory](./yoot.yootfactory.md)<!-- -->, [DirectiveMethods](./yoot.directivemethods.md)<!-- -->, [OutputMethods](./yoot.outputmethods.md)
